SELECT DISTINCT t.`class_id` AS classId, t.`class_abbreviation` AS classAbbreviation, t.`class_name` className, t.`class_start_date` AS classStartDate, t.`graduate_date` AS graduateDate, t.`teacher_id` AS teacherId, t.`teacher_name` AS teacherName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_class_stu_2_class WHERE class_id=t.`class_id` AND STATUS=0) AS classStuCtn FROM v_class_lesson_check t WHERE 1=1
AND t.`class_name` LIKE '%${className}%'
AND t.`teacher_name` LIKE '%${teacherName}%'
order by class_name desc

SELECT DISTINCT t.`class_id` as classId, t.`class_name` as className, t.`course_instance_id` as courseInstanceId, t.`course_instance_name` as courseInstanceName, t.`course_start_time` as courseStartTime, t.`course_end_time` as courseEndTime, t.`teacher_id` as teacherId, t.`teacher_name` as teacherName, t.`lecture_pkg_id` as lecturePkgId, t.`lecture_pkg_name` as lecturePkgName FROM v_class_lesson_check t WHERE 1=1
AND t.`class_id`=${classId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_study_lesson_2_student (lesson_id, student_id) SELECT DISTINCT ${lessonId}, a.`student_id` FROM t_class_stu_2_class a WHERE a.`class_id` = ${classId} AND a.`status` = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_study_lesson_2_student a INNER JOIN t_study_lesson_task_check b ON a.`attend_id`=b.`attend_id` INNER JOIN t_study_task_package c ON b.`task_pkg_id`=c.`task_pkg_id` WHERE 1=1 AND a.`lesson_id`=${lessonId} AND c.`task_pkg_id`=${taskPkgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_study_lesson_task_check(attend_id,task_pkg_id,group_id,seat_id) SELECT DISTINCT a.`attend_id`, ${taskPkgId} , c.`group_id`, c.`seat_id` FROM t_study_lesson_2_student a LEFT JOIN t_class_stu_2_class b ON a.`student_id`=b.`student_id` LEFT JOIN t_class_seat c ON b.`id`=c.`stu_class_id` WHERE 1=1 AND a.lesson_id=${lessonId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_study_lesson_task_check t SET t.`check_status` = 0, t.`update_time`=NOW() WHERE t.`task_pkg_id` = ${taskPkgId} AND t.`attend_id` IN (SELECT a.attend_id FROM t_study_lesson_2_student a WHERE a.`lesson_id` = ${lessonId})
UPDATE t_study_lesson_task_check t SET t.`check_status` = ${checkStatus}, t.`update_time`=NOW() WHERE t.`check_id`=${checkId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.`task_pkg_name` FROM t_study_task_package t WHERE t.`task_pkg_id`=${taskPkgId}
